title: Mathieu van der Poel Flawless in Final World Cup, Primed for World Championships
content:
Dutchman bides time in race before hammering rivals one week out from worlds title defense, Iserbyt takes fifth to seal World Cup overall.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel Flawless in Final World Cup, Primed for World Championships on Velo.
author: sstokes
